Class Group

  • java.lang.Object
    • Group

  • public class Group
extends java.lang.Object
    A group chat. Encompases a group of users who are all in a chat together and gives the group a name.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      java.lang.String name
      Name of group chat
      java.util.ArrayList<User> users
      Users currently participating in this group chat

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Group(java.lang.String name)
      Creates an empty group chat.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Finds the current user, removes her from the group, and returns her.

      Adds a user to the group chat
      byte[] pack()
      Convert a Chat object into a byte array for sending to a new user.
      static Group unpack(java.lang.String name, java.io.BufferedInputStream input)
      Creates a chat with users given.
